verses.name: Luke 11:26
verses.text: Then goeth he, and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself; and they enter in, and dwell there: and the last state of that man is worse than the first.

verses.name: Luke 11:27
verses.text: And it came to pass, as he spake these things, a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice, and said unto him, Blessed is the womb that bare thee, and the paps which thou hast sucked.

verses.name: Luke 11:28
verses.text: But he said, Yea rather, blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it.
